title: PSA: always leave one honey fruit for scuttle.
body:
These poor souls get beaten down thousands of times a day. they are forced to crawl through a river relentlessly only to be struck down by giant bullies. The only solace the scuttle crab gets through out its entire life is being able to nibble on some honey fruit from time to time.

For that reason, I always leave one honey fruit for scuttles to enjoy, as it is their only joy in this world. 

http://img.youtube.com/vi/660cluWjdVs/sddefault.jpg 

please donate your honey fruit today. Every fruit counts. Your donations matter.
